game.name: Snowball Fight
game.description:
If you are sick of enjoying highly addictive and competitive Spike Rush and any other action-packed shooter challenge, the new Snowball Fight is just for you. Hey! Your objective in this latest shooting game is to through the snowballs as quick as you can and try to clear the screen from all of the deadly monsters. Try to cover as many monsters as you can to score high in the end! Common! This is not a fight. You will participate to improve your quick reflexes and have fun.

You would have a plenty of dangerous goblins to face off in this HTML5 action game. Santa and his helping hands elves look busy in making the preparations for the biggest celebration of the year â€“ Christmas. Now it is up to you how to finish them all in each level and make Santa believe that he is still surrounded by some good people. No need to show pity on these mischievous monsters as they will do everything to stop Santa from doing his efforts.

Yes! Being an expert shooter, you have taken the responsibility of teaching them a needful lesson. These dangerous goblins have entered the area with an intention to steal all the gifts shown on the screen time to time, and destroy snowmen. Grab your snowballs and get ready to hit the goblins and show them that they will not disturb you at any cost! Hit on them to earn points in this cool shooter challenge! They will try to hide behind the other objects so take care of it and fight in this Christmas like never before. Play even more tricky free Christmas games on atmegame.com and have fun!
